text: Chaplin is a 1992 American biographical comedy-drama movie. It is about the life of British comedian Charlie Chaplin. It was directed by Richard Attenborough. It stars Robert Downey, Jr., Moira Kelly, Dan Aykroyd, Geraldine Chaplin, Penelope Ann Miller, Anthony Hopkins, James Woods, and Kevin Kline. It's soundtrack was composed by John Barry. It was released on December 25, 1992 to mixed reviews. == Other websites == * Category:1992 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Japanese biographical movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Movies directed by Richard Attenborough Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies about comedians Category:Movies about entertainers Category:Movies based on autobiographies Category:Movies based on biographies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Swiss culture
